intro: Create a shop that every TCG fan dreams of visiting!
description:
Start your own card shop in TCG Card Market Simulator! Stock up on the latest booster packs, or open them yourself to grow your personal collection. Set prices, manage your stock, hire staff, and organize tournaments to attract TCG fans. In this card shop simulation, your mission is to turn your small business into a bustling hub for trading card enthusiasts, all while navigating the ups and downs of the market to maximize profits.
Manage Your Store: Customize your shop layout, keep shelves neat, and highlight rare cards to create a seamless shopping experience. Make smart business moves, track market trends, and build a loyal customer base as you grow your TCG empire!
Features:
- Shop Customization: Design and personalize your card shop’s layout, from shelves to decor, to enhance the customer experience and attract more buyers.
- Inventory Management: Stock your store with the latest booster packs, single cards, and rare finds. Balance supply and demand while avoiding overstocking or running out of hot items.
- Pricing and Strategy: Set your own prices, offering discounts or marking up rare cards to maximize profits. Adapt your strategy to market trends and customer preferences.
- Market Trends: Monitor the fluctuating TCG market, predict price changes, and make strategic investments to capitalize on the rise and fall of card values.
